name: evasive
text: Prevent all damage that would be done to this zombie.

name: spiky
text: This zombie does 1 damage to you when it enters your horde zone.

name: explosive
text: This zombie does 2 damage to you when it is destroyed. Remove it from the game.

name: thieving
text: Discard 1 card when this zombie enters your horde zone.

name: reanimating
text: Reanimate 1 zombie when this zombie enters your horde zone.

name: preventing
text: As long as this zombie is face up in your horde zone, you cannot active character abilities.

name: douchy
text: When this zombie enters your horde zone, draw another card from the zombie deck and place it face up in your horde zone.

name: pinata
text: Draw a card when this zombie is destroyed in your horde zone.

name: gelatinous
text: When this zombie enters your horde zone, take one item from your item zone and place it underneath this zombie. You cannot use the item as long as the item is underneath this zombie. When this zombie dies in your horde zone, take any items underneath it and placce them in your item zone.

name: resilient
text: Prevent the first 1 damage dealt to this zombie every turn.
